name: To Fall Forever
description:
Who was Wila Longmurk? Does anyone even remember her.

Everything forgotten by the cosmos must end up somewhere.

Then what would it mean to be remembered once more?

Left click to interact with things.

Right click to xamine things.

Contains potentially disturbing, graphic and or upsetting content.

If you enjoyed this game be sure to rate it, recommend it to your friends or leave a comment on what your feedback is.
